title: Close-up on Kuwait
creator_credit: Rodney Giesler, Derek Armstrong and Kuwait Oil Company Film Unit
brief_description: From Kuwait more oil is shipped annually than from any other oil port in the world, bringing in return a wealth of manufactured goods from other countries. A Government Development Board ensures that the country as a whole shares this new prosperity in the free State medical service, schools, and research into cultivation of desert areas.
